item.title: BILLY BOYS - SHORT FILM
item.description:
BILLY BOYS - SHORT FILM

I don't think we truly realise the power of technology, 3D printers are more accessible now than they have ever been and the reality is that to make a gun is as simple as the click of a button. I present to you...

item.title: Sneak Peek At Erotic Photographer Frank De Mulder's New Book Heaven
item.description:
Sneak Peek At Erotic Photographer Frank De Mulder's New Book Heaven

Frank De Mulder specializes in photographing beautiful models in exotic settings while using light and contour to give his subjects an almost otherworldly clarity.

item.title: Will This Floating Wearable Keep You From Dying In A Watery Grave?
item.description:
Will This Floating Wearable Keep You From Dying In A Watery Grave?

The most recent survival gadget to hit the crowd-funding market is essentially a life jacket you wear on your wrist. They're calling it Kingii, and at the very least, it may be the answer to awkward life-vest tan lines.

item.title: A Brief History of the World's Coolest Steering Wheel | Maxim
item.description:
A Brief History of the World's Coolest Steering Wheel | Maxim

To celebrate Ferrari's 60th anniversary, Maxim presents the evolution of the most exquisite steering wheel.

item.title: Top Ten Exciting Toyotas
item.description:
Top Ten Exciting Toyotas

You could be forgiven if the name "Toyota" conjures notions of beige suburban normcore. But you've probably forgotten the sensuous 1967 Toyota 2000GT and a raft of other exciting cars the company has built over the years. These cars are highlighted in Toyota's Torrance, Calif. museum.

item.title: The 10 Most Powerful Handguns on the Planet
item.description:
The 10 Most Powerful Handguns on the Planet

The Smith & Wesson .44 Magnum blasted the big-bore handgun into pop culture way back in 1971, as the preferred sidearm of Clint Eastwood's "Dirty Harry". Forty-four years later it still ranks among the most powerful production handguns available, but there's no shortage of modern-day power pistols that are even more formidable.

item.title: Exclusive: Emily Ratajkowski on John Updike, Acting and Getting Naked
item.description:
Exclusive: Emily Ratajkowski on John Updike, Acting and Getting Naked

Let's just stipulate from the outset: Emily Ratajkowski is a very attractive woman. From a purely visual standpoint, she's got it going on. That said, it's not just her looks that make us love her. We're not that shallow. Looks are pedestrian. They're earthbound. They're just looks. Get over it!

item.title: The New Classics of Motorcycle Style
item.description:
The New Classics of Motorcycle Style

Style in the motorcycle scene doesn't change a whole lot. You've mostly got leather, denim, boots, gloves, and helmets to play around with, and fashion here tends to be-first and foremost-functional. But motorcycle culture is also about self-expression. So while bright green, high-visibility jackets and bulky, waterproof pants might keep you safe, they're not stylish, and that's no good.
